title: "China’s single mothers face false starts on the road to recognition"
excerpt: "For a few glorious weeks, Zou Xiaoqi, a single mother in Shanghai, felt accepted by her government. After giving birth in 2017, Ms Zou, a financial worker, went to court to challenge Shanghai’s policy of giving maternity benefits to married women only."
